sections.heading: Transfer of Michigan Office of Postsecondary Educational Attainment From Department of Labor and Economic Opportunity to Department of Lifelong Education, Advancement, and Potential; Transfer of Michigan Indian Tuition Waiver From Department of Civil Rights to Department of Lifelong Education, Advan
sections.text: Transfer of Michigan Office of Postsecondary Educational Attainment From Department of Labor and Economic Opportunity to Department of Lifelong Education, Advancement, and Potential; Transfer of Michigan Indian Tuition Waiver From Department of Civil Rights to Department of Lifelong Education, Advancement, and Potential; Transfer of Michigan Tax Tribunal From Michigan Office of Administrative Hearings and Rules to Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs; Modification of Membership of the Workers' Disability Compensation Appeals Commission.
